sentences.en: Administration officials have winnowed the list of candidates to three.
sentences.cn: 行政官员将候选人名单筛减到三人。

sentences.en: All this makes the team members more competent knowledge crunchers winnow out the extraneous.
sentences.cn: 所有的这些能够使得团队成员成为胜任的知识消化者.

sentences.en: It's important to winnow truth from falsehood in scientific research.
sentences.cn: 在科研工作中去伪存真是很重要的.

sentences.en: The committee will need to winnow out the nonsense and produce more practical proposals if it is to achieve results.
sentences.cn: 委员会若要取得成果，需要摈除不着边际的观点，提出更实际的建议。

sentences.en: We should winnow out the errors in logic.
sentences.cn: 我们应该排除逻辑中的错误.

sentences.en: You should winnow out the inaccuracies of this paper this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 你今天下午把这篇文章中不精确的内容删掉.

trans.tran_cn: 簸, 扬(谷), 吹开糠皮, 吹掉, 精选
扬，辨别， 选择， 除去
